# After every change
- Bump the version in fifteenrock/constants.py
- Push to Git
- Push to PyPi
- Update the JupyterHub Image and update JupyterHub on K8 and the Compute serivce. Instructions here. `$FIFTEENROCK_DIR/fifteenrock-jupyterhub-basic-image/README.md`
### fifteenrock

Python client library for the 15Rock platform.
